short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to search the shop wizard more effectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Resubmits searches for you to search various shop sections on the Neopets Shop Wizard. Keeps the best prices at the top so that you can have a more similar experience to the Super Shop Wizard but without Neopets Premium.

Note that since this extension resubmits for you automatically, it is NOT necessarily compliant with TNT, so use at your own risk on Neopets.

If you are looking for an extension that IS condoned by TNT, you can use a different extension called Neon (made by a totally different developer) which is also available on the Chrome Web Store and inspired the creation of this extension (but for people who don't care about TNT rules).

If you notice any bugs, please let us know in the support tab on the Chrome webstore listing.
